    • 构造器详细资料

      • DrawUI

        public DrawUI(UI accelerateUI,
              UI buidUI,
              UI damageUI,
              UI manaUI,
              UI pauseUI,
              UI rangeUI,
              UI speedUI,
              GameSet gameSet,
              Mana mana,
              Board board,
              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> maps)
        The constructor of DrawUI,Initializes a DrawUI object with UI elements, game set, mana, board, and image mappings.
        参数:
        accelerateUI - The UI for game acceleration.
        buidUI - The UI for tower building.
        damageUI - The UI for tower damage upgrade.
        manaUI - The UI for managing mana.
        pauseUI - The UI for pausing the game.
        rangeUI - The UI for tower range upgrade.
        speedUI - The UI for tower speed upgrade.
        gameSet - The game set containing game state information.
        mana - The mana object for managing mana.
        board - The game board.
        maps - A HashMap of images used for rendering various elements.

    • 方法详细资料

      • drawUI

        public void drawUI(processing.core.PApplet app1,
                   UI ui,
                   java.lang.String textToDisplay,
                   java.lang.String additionalText,
                   boolean fillRect1,
                   boolean fillRect2,
                   int c1,
                   int c2,
                   int c3,
                   int c4,
                   int c5,
                   int c6)
        Draws a UI element, including a rectangular background and text.
        参数:
        app1 - The PApplet used for drawing.
        ui - The UI element to be drawn.
        textToDisplay - The main text to display on the UI element.
        additionalText - Additional text to display below the main text.
        fillRect1 - Whether to fill the main background rectangle.
        fillRect2 - Whether to fill the rectangle for additional text.
        c1 - The red color component for the main rectangle (0-255).
        c2 - The green color component for the main rectangle (0-255).
        c3 - The blue color component for the main rectangle (0-255).
        c4 - The red color component for the additional text rectangle (0-255).
        c5 - The green color component for the additional text rectangle (0-255).
        c6 - The blue color component for the additional text rectangle (0-255).

      • drawLabel

        public void drawLabel(processing.core.PApplet app,
                      boolean fillRect,
                      UI ui,
                      int n)
        Draws the cost label for the UI element, including a rectangular background and text.
        参数:
        app - The PApplet used for drawing.
        fillRect - Whether to fill the background rectangle for the cost label.
        ui - The UI element to attach the cost label to.
        n - The cost value to display on the label.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws all UI elements on the screen.
        指定者:
        draw 在类中 DrawTool
        参数:
        app - The PApplet used for drawing.
